title: Smokers often misunderstand health risks of smokeless tobacco product, study finds

title_detail.value: Smokers often misunderstand health risks of smokeless tobacco product, study finds

summary: American smokers mistakenly think that using snus, a type of moist snuff smokeless tobacco product, is as dangerous as smoking tobacco, according to a study. The study provides new research on what smokers think about snus, a Swedish style product that is popular in Scandinavia, but newer to the United States.
